text: Though Meghan Markle was all smiles for her first Trooping the Colour ceremony in an off the shoulder, sleeveless dress, some critics on Twitter are slamming the look as “ inappropriate ” for Queen Elizabeth ’ s annual birthday parade. On June 9, the newly minted Duchess of Sussex joined her husband, Prince Harry, and the entire royal family for the London festivities. The highly attended ceremony celebrates a 250 - year - old British tradition where military troops show off their flags ( or colours ) and march throughout the Buckingham Palace square, Fox News reports. MEGHAN MARKLE ’ S BEST FRIEND HAS'PIPPA MOMENT'IN FITTED DRESS Queen Elizabeth, whose real birthday is on April 21, turned 92 this year. For the special event,
